text: Sanjay Raman is an electrical engineer. He is a professor of electrical and computer engineering at Virginia Tech, where he is also associate vice president of Virginia Tech in the National Capital Region.Sanjay Raman, Virginia Tech, retrieved 2019-11-13 He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for his work on adaptive microwave and millimeter-wave integrated circuits. == References == ==External links== * Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Virginia Tech faculty Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sanjay Raman
